```{r load_data, echo = FALSE}
rp_pattern <- c(
    "Anthyllis" = "anthyllis",
    "Pistacia" = "pistachia",
    "Dorycnium" = "dorycnium") 
expe_duration <- function(date, starting = as.yearmon("nov. 2015")) {
time_span <- interval(starting, date) / duration(1, units = "weeks")
res  <- time_span/4 # Convert in  month
as.integer(res)
}
```
